dict.acceptation: 给…镶边；用带绑扎；（将价格、收入等）划分档次；把…联合起来；
聚集，联合（起来）（通常与together 连用）；

sent.orig: Select a desired band using BAND.
sent.trans: 用BAND选择器选择要听的波段。

sent.orig: This paper develops a voice compress algorithm-SB-ADPCM (Sub Band-adaptive Differential Pulse Code Modulation).
sent.trans: 论述了计算机数字录音技术中的语音压缩算法—SB-ADPCM(Sub Band-Adaptive Differential Pulse Code Modulation)方法。

sent.orig: In band structures, one band that is empty with electrons is termed conduction band.
sent.trans: 在能带结构中，未填充电子的带称为导带。

sent.orig: In the band structure, one band that is completely filled with electrons is termed valence band.
sent.trans: 在能带结构中，完全填满电子的带被称为价带。

sent.orig: Band Introduction: Founded in 1991, Band of Zhongguancun middle School now includes 120 band members.
sent.trans: 乐团简介：中关村中学管乐团成立于1991年，现有团员120人。
